member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Messengers.RequestReplyMessenger`1.Stop
member.summary: Stops the messenger. Cancels all waiting threads in SendMessageAndWaitForResponse method and stops message queue. SendMessageAndWaitForResponse method throws exception if there is a thread that is waiting for response message. Also stops incoming message processing and deletes all messages in incoming message queue.

member.summary: Calls Stop method of this object.

member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Messengers.RequestReplyMessenger`1.SendMessage(Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Messages.IScsMessage)
member.summary: Sends a message.

member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Messengers.RequestReplyMessenger`1.SendMessageAndWaitForResponse(Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Messages.IScsMessage)
member.summary: Sends a message and waits a response for that message.
member.remarks:
Response message is matched with RepliedMessageId property, so if any other message (that is not reply for sent message) is received from remote application, it is not considered as a reply and is not returned as return value of this method.
MessageReceived event is not raised for response messages.

member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Messengers.RequestReplyMessenger`1.SendMessageAndWaitForResponse(Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Messages.IScsMessage,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a message and waits a response for that message.
member.remarks:
Response message is matched with RepliedMessageId property, so if any other message (that is not reply for sent message) is received from remote application, it is not considered as a reply and is not returned as return value of this method.
MessageReceived event is not raised for response messages.
member.exception: Throws TimeoutException if can not receive reply message in timeout value
Throws CommunicationException if communication fails before reply message.

member.name: T:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Protocols.BinarySerialization.BinarySerializationProtocol
member.summary:
Default communication protocol between server and clients to send and receive a message. It uses .NET binary serialization to write and read messages.
A Message format: [Message Length (4 bytes)][Serialized Message Content]
If a message is serialized to byte array as N bytes, this protocol adds 4 bytes size information to head of the message bytes, so total length is (4 + N) bytes.
This class can be derived to change serializer (default: BinaryFormatter). To do this, SerializeMessage and DeserializeMessage methods must be overrided.

member.name: F:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Protocols.BinarySerialization.BinarySerializationProtocol.MaxMessageLength
member.summary: Maximum length of a message.

member.name: F:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Protocols.BinarySerialization.BinarySerializationProtocol._receiveMemoryStream
member.summary: This MemoryStream object is used to collect receiving bytes to build messages.

member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Protocols.BinarySerialization.BinarySerializationProtocol.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of BinarySerializationProtocol.

member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Protocols.BinarySerialization.BinarySerializationProtocol.GetBytes(Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Messages.IScsMessage)
member.summary: Serializes a message to a byte array to send to remote application. This method is synchronized. So, only one thread can call it concurrently.
member.exception: Throws CommunicationException if message is bigger than maximum allowed message length.

member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Protocols.BinarySerialization.BinarySerializationProtocol.CreateMessages(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Builds messages from a byte array that is received from remote application. The Byte array may contain just a part of a message, the protocol must cumulate bytes to build messages. This method is synchronized. So, only one thread can call it concurrently.
member.returns: List of messages. Protocol can generate more than one message from a byte array. Also, if received bytes are not sufficient to build a message, the protocol may return an empty list (and save bytes to combine with next method call).

member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Protocols.BinarySerialization.BinarySerializationProtocol.Reset
member.summary: This method is called when connection with remote application is reset (connection is renewing or first connecting). So, wire protocol must reset itself.

member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Protocols.BinarySerialization.BinarySerializationProtocol.SerializeMessage(Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Messages.IScsMessage)
member.summary: This method is used to serialize a IScsMessage to a byte array. This method can be overrided by derived classes to change serialization strategy. It is a couple with DeserializeMessage method and must be overrided together.
member.returns: Serialized message bytes. Does not include length of the message.

member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Protocols.BinarySerialization.BinarySerializationProtocol.DeserializeMessage(System.Byte[])
member.summary: This method is used to deserialize a IScsMessage from it's bytes. This method can be overrided by derived classes to change deserialization strategy. It is a couple with SerializeMessage method and must be overrided together.
member.param: Bytes of message to be deserialized (does not include message length. It consist of a single whole message)

member.name: M:Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Protocols.BinarySerialization.BinarySerializationProtocol.ReadSingleMessage(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{Hik.Communication.Scs.Communication.Messages.IScsMessage})
member.summary: This method tries to read a single message and add to the messages collection.
member.returns: Returns a boolean value indicates that if there is a need to re-call this method.
member.exception: Throws CommunicationException if message is bigger than maximum allowed message length.

member.summary: Writes a int value to a byte array from a starting index.
member.param: Byte array to write int value
Start index of byte array to write

member.summary: Deserializes and returns a serialized integer.

member.summary: Reads a byte array with specified length.

member.exception: Throws EndOfStreamException if can not read from stream.
